page.title: 18HUTTON ESTATE - MAINTENANCE
page.content:
The Estate Maintenance Department now comprises a master joiner, Mr R Allen, employed since 1969, and an assistant bricklayer/mason, Mr R Morley, employed since he left school in 1956.
They are based at the Estate Yard, Unthank, where there is a joiner's shop, wood storage facilities, and a stack yard. Some of the wood used is homegrown hardwood, while most softwood is bought in.
Of recenct years much of their work has been doing repairs to houses, cottages and farm buildings on the Estate, particulary to the roofs. In addition a considerable amount of work has been done to the 'Hall' in connection with 'House Opening' activities.
